channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Colorado Is Building a Gender Ideology Dystopia
item.description: Lawmakers pushing for this madness might deserve to reap a political whirlwind and a judicial rebuke, but how many children will be harmed in the mean...

item.title: Trump’s Anti-Abundance Agenda
item.description: Dismissing the legitimate economic concerns of American consumers has never been a winning political strategy.

item.title: Return to Alcatraz?
item.description: The mythology around the prison is part of American lore. That doesn’t mean that we need to devote scarce resources to bringing it back online.

item.title: Congress Should Keep California From Dictating Environmental Rules To The Whole Country
item.description: Repealing Biden-era California waivers is an appropriate exercise of congressional powers against executive misinterpretation of the law.

item.title: Trump’s First 100 Days Have Shattered California’s Left-Wing Illusions
item.description: President Trump has pushed aside Governor Gavin Newsom and driven the nation’s most populous state toward something approaching sanity.

item.title: Pro-Trump legal group sues Chief Justice Roberts over denied records request
item.description: A pro-Trump legal group once led by the president's top aide, Stephen Miller, has sued Supreme Court Chief Justice John G. Roberts Jr.

item.title: Obama-Era Health Agency Was Supposed To Cut Spending By $3 Billion But Grew It By $5 Billion Instead
item.description: Trump and Congress can help rein in waste and government overreach by putting an end to the Center for Medicare and Medicaid Innovation.

item.title: In 7 States, Officials Claim To Request Voter ID But Allow Paperwork Loopholes
item.description: If someone lacks ID while voting in person... they must simply sign forms claiming to be the voter, and officials will let them cast a ballot.
